main event: A circular blue-glowing object, approximately 45 feet in diameter, was observed in the sky over Sacramento, California on July 13, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as having a circular, white appearance with a blue glow.
The object was observed visually from the ground for about 3 minutes.
The object was observed moving overhead, heading west, at an unspecified speed and altitude.
The observers were a housewife and another unidentified individual located in Sacramento, California.
The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were clear.
sighted object: circular white object with blue glow
